objectives: Students will discuss daily routines and habits using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Sports/Competition themed scenarios related to daily routines and habits
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining daily routines and habits content with Sports/Competition narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore daily routines and habits through a Sports/Competition lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a competitive sports scenario involving daily routines and habits

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to daily routines and habits in a sports context
Students engage in sports themed role-play about daily routines and habits using slang register
Students create original sports themed content about daily routines and habits in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe daily routines and habits in a Sports/Competition scenario?
What competition or victory might be involved in daily routines and habits?
Can you create a Sports/Competition story about daily routines and habits?
How does daily routines and habits change when viewed through a Sports/Competition perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this sports scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Sports/Competition situation involving daily routines and habits
roles: Character A: Using slang register in sports context
Character B: Responding in slang register within sports theme

topic_genre_blend: daily routines and habits with competition
daily routines and habits with victory
daily routines and habits with training

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Sports/Competition theme: Athletic challenges, competition, teamwork

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Sports/Competition themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
